summary: A diligent self-learner and a passionate knowledge sharer. I strive to build great products and can take an initial idea, tackle it from multiple angles and take it from something great to something incredible. With both accounting/auditing and software development experience, I mitigate the gap between end users and developers, co-design and build scalable solutions.

experience.description: Worked as a full-stack developer for Ernst & Young. I was responsible for the architecture and development of the trial balance system. From scratch to finish, we protyped the whole system, analyzed user's needs, coded it along, passed infosec review then finally the system went live. As the main developer, I also served as an instructor to teach auditors how to use the system.
Performed financial audits for several public listed companies.
Performed financial audits for several public listed companies.
Collected CSR reports published by companies, analyzed GRI Standards and helped to prepare CSR reports.

projects.name: Excel-starter
projects.description: It's a website documenting basic Excel techniques which I deemed newbie auditor should know and sharing VBA tools I developed to tackle working papers.

projects.name: Trial Balance System
projects.description: It's the smartest trial balance solution in Taiwan which was in house developed and targeted for audit leadsheet generatinon. The system was approved by EY Gloabl InfoSec Team.

projects.name: PDF2Excel
projects.description: PDF2Excel is a tool that extracts all tables from PDF files and saves them into separate Excel(.xlsx) files. I developed it because one of our clients provide its audit package using PDF format. The tool saves auditors a great amout of time coverting PDF to Excel manually.

projects.name: TickMark
projects.description: An Excel Add-in for auditors, which includes most commonly-used symbols and functions that auditors would love.

projects.name: VBA Addins
projects.description: The blog I built based on Jekyll to document my learning progress and to share the add-ins I created which were used to increase my efficiency at work.

projects.name: Commercial Law App
projects.description: My first mobile application aimed at helping myself to prepare the CPA Exam in spare time.

projects.name: Liu Input Method Tutorial
projects.description: The tutorial website teaches how to use Liu input method(嘸蝦米輸入法).
